name: Crazy Fishing Champion
summary: This is a fishing game, 100 clearances with different fishes, dual-mode of life and time, in which you can enjoy the fishing as well as enrich your knowledge on fishes at the same time. The background story of the game is the Gulf's annual world fishing contest, in Hawaii, where the fishing enthusiasts around the world gather, in the hope of competing for the Champion title. In addition to the enjoyment of Bay Resort in Hawaii, the fishing champion could also enjoy a trip of Venice.
